sqls.sql: SELECT app.id, app.APPLICATION_NO, app.APP_TYPE, app.SERVICE_ID, app.LICENCE_ID, app.ORIGIN_LICENCE_ID, app.BASE_APP_ID, app.BASE_LICENCE_ID, app.NEED_INSPECTION, app.STATUS, app.APP_GRP_ID, app.CREATED_DT, app.CREATED_BY, app.UPDATED_DT, app.UPDATED_BY FROM APPLICATION AS app WHERE 1=1 <#if APPLICATION_NO??> AND CHARINDEX(:APPLICATION_NO, app.APPLICATION_NO) >0</#if> <#if STATUS??> AND app.STATUS = :STATUS</#if> <#if APP_TYPE??> AND app.APP_TYPE = :APP_TYPE</#if>
